experience: You and Jay both know Lance Klem, Erika Flora PMP, PgMP, ITIL Expert,PRINCE2,CSP, and 91 others
Remote Work Locations Self Sub - Contractor

■ Well versed with SQL Server 2008, 2008R2, 2012, 2014,2016, and SQL Azure.■ Recognized as a hands-on, proactive professional who can rapidly identify problems,formulate   tactical plans, initiate change and implement effective programs in challenging and diverse    environments■ Team builder,capable of implementing best practices and motivating staff to peak performance. ■ Solid business leadership skills and abilities which are well suited to a variety of industries■ Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, effective written and verbal communication skills,   interpersonal skills, Organizational and Multi-Tasking Skills

*Worked within our team to support DOD Tricare Dental Program with was under the UHG/Optum *Technology Support Contract*Tracking and resolving all database issues related to Production, QA and Development Healthcare *Government environments*Supported PowerShell scripts for monitoring and reporting on the health of all the databases and systems in within the Gov’t UHG Organization;*Used CyberArk to access Work Bench Servers*HPSA/HPSM for Server diagnostic and Support with SQL 2014*Data Warehousing Design and Support

*DUP Mon Server Installation and Upgrades  Script (SQL Server 2012) *RDS_Web Migration to SCATDB01 Script (From SQL 2000 to SQL 2008) *Mesa BBAnalytic  Script (SQL Server 2012) *Canvas ILM_Logons Script (SQL Server 2*MetaSys Server Installation and Upgrades (SQL Server 2012) *HelpDeskWorldWide DB Server Upgrades (SQL Server 2012) *BIADB Server Upgrades (SQL Server 2008-2012) *RDS_FTSE Created Database Migration from (SQL 2005) to (SQL Server 2012) *STCATDB1 Database created and maintained (SQL Server 2012) *ILM_Login Creation and Schema Creation (SQL Server 2012) *Prepared, and participated in quarterly DR tests with our IT and application support teams.

*Installed and maintained SQL Server databases, including: ensuring successful backups, resolving system issues, opening cases with technical support to resolve issues, monitoring success and failure of automated jobs, monitor system availability, updating system documentation, system and database recovery, etc. *Updated database by reviewing, planning, testing, installing database security patches and service packs. *Designed, documented, and promoted security "best practices", policies, standards and protocols. *Worked in Active/Active, Active / Passive Cluster environment as a High availability solution *Data Warehousing Design and Support

Whom it may concern,I have worked with Jay Witherspoon for the past 2 years. Mr. Witherspoon is one of the most dedicated and hard-working people that I know.He always lifts others up, encouraging them to go farther, be better and move ahead in their endeavors. Mr. Witherspoon has built a stellar reputation, not only as a technician, but as someone that others can trust.You can always find someone to perform tasks, do a job, manage, troubleshoot issues, etc.., but finding someone that has integrity and is trustworthy is truly valuable.Mr. Witherspoon always has the best interest of the individual, the team and the company in mind and measures all of his efforts and decisions with fairness and equality.He never takes on the easy tasks, always the hard ones and puts everything into all that he does.Robert McKee
